title: Freezing??
body: So anytime I go into a draft mode queue, sometimes blind pick but mostly draft, it'll freeze and the accept game wont even pop up for me, and if it does when i get into champ select, it'll freeze at least 2 times, maybe more, depending on where I am in placement. Ugh.

replies.body: It sounds like something is causing your client to render improperly.  I've seen a few reports on this, and it seems that cthe culprit has been third party programs.  If you are using any apps like play.tv or overwolf, disable them.  Let me know if that doesn't help!
